## Executive Summary
Total Issues Found: **6** - ðŸ”´ Critical: **0** (MUST fix before launch) - ðŸŸ High: **6** (Should fix before launch) - ðŸŸ¡ Medium: **0** (Fix if time permits)
---
## ðŸŸ HIGH PRIORITY ISSUES (6)
**Strongly recommended to fix before launch**
### 1. Language Inconsistency: Found 1 occurrence(s)
**Issue:** English word "remote working" found in Dutch content
**Fix:** Replace with Dutch equivalent: "thuiswerken"
**Screenshot:** `/Users/florian/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-WorkfloB.V/Documenten/code/Cursor/new-project/test-results/pre-launch-qa/language-remote-working.png`
---
### 2. Language Inconsistency: Found 2 occurrence(s)
**Issue:** English word "setup" found in Dutch content
**Fix:** Replace with Dutch equivalent: "installatie"
**Screenshot:** `/Users/florian/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-WorkfloB.V/Documenten/code/Cursor/new-project/test-results/pre-launch-qa/language-setup.png`
---
### 3. Language Inconsistency: Found 2 occurrence(s)
**Issue:** English word "remote" found in Dutch content
**Fix:** Replace with Dutch equivalent: "op afstand"
**Screenshot:** `/Users/florian/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-WorkfloB.V/Documenten/code/Cursor/new-project/test-results/pre-launch-qa/language-remote.png`
---
### 4. Language Inconsistency: Found 5 occurrence(s)
**Issue:** English word "business" found in Dutch content
**Fix:** Replace with Dutch equivalent: "bedrijf"
**Screenshot:** `/Users/florian/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-WorkfloB.V/Documenten/code/Cursor/new-project/test-results/pre-launch-qa/language-business.png`
---
### 5. Language Inconsistency: Found 7 occurrence(s)
**Issue:** English word "support" found in Dutch content
**Fix:** Replace with Dutch equivalent: "ondersteuning"
**Screenshot:** `/Users/florian/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-WorkfloB.V/Documenten/code/Cursor/new-project/test-results/pre-launch-qa/language-support.png`
---
### 6. Language Inconsistency: Found 16 occurrence(s)
**Issue:** English word "service" found in Dutch content
**Fix:** Replace with Dutch equivalent: "dienst"
**Screenshot:** `/Users/florian/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-WorkfloB.V/Documenten/code/Cursor/new-project/test-results/pre-launch-qa/language-service.png`
---
